message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a lower price, but I'm not comfortable going below $8,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. I'm open to further discussion, but I can't go lower than that.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $8,000, which is a price I'm comfortable with. Would you be willing to sell the product to me at this price?
